pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Functions-py## Installation`pip3 install supafunc`## UsageDeploy your function as per documentation.```python3import asynciofrom supafunc import AsyncFunctionsClientasync def run_func(): fc = AsyncFunctionsClient("https://<project_ref>.functions.supabase.co", {}) res = await fc.invoke("payment-sheet", {"responseType": "json"})if __name__ == "__main__": asyncio.run(run_func())```
